properties.title: Labyrinthe Aventure
properties.abstract: The Labyrinthe Aventure is the world's largest maze. With its 3 km course, this model of the Valais leads you to the discovery of towns and villages of the region and enables you to discover our secret valleys.
properties.description:
Recreational garden, the Labyrinthe Aventure is primarily a spectacular natural setting which you can visit on a school trip, in family or even alone. Located between Martigny and St-Maurice, the park invites adventurers of all ages to share moments of pleasure in an authentic and friendly atmosphere.

After having found your way among thousands of Thuja trees, a playground awaits you at the end of the maze : Gigantic slides measuring 30 meters, zip lines, a climbing wall, trampoline, etc.

Depending upon the season, the park offers various themes such as Halloween, an Easter egg hunt or a treasure hunt.
properties.name: Labyrinthe Aventure
